Name: ApiGatewayUsagePlanApiStage
Documentation: ApiStage is a property of the AWS::ApiGateway::UsagePlan resource that specifies which Amazon API Gateway (API Gateway) stages and APIs to associate with a usage plan.

Parameters.Name: ApiId
Parameters.Documentation: The ID of an API that is in the specified Stage property that you want to associate with the usage plan.

Parameters.Name: Stage
Parameters.Documentation: The name of an API Gateway stage to associate with the usage plan.
